name: Match Rush
description:
Select identical tiles to remove them from the board. Don't let the tiles be burned by the laser beam. Swipe down to move the tiles closer to the laser beam.

Tap a bomb to destroy many tiles or a clock to freeze time.

Choose between 3 game modes: Arcade, Speed Trial and Buggy!

Sign in to your Google account to save your name in the global leaderboard.

iOS users

The game doesn't play correctly on iOS through the itch.io page . If you are an iOS user please play the game from here: https://grifoi.org/match-rush/MatchRush.html
